title: Here Comes Civilization: The Complete Science Fiction of William Tenn, Volume 2
description: Contains the rest of Tenn's short fiction (not included in Volume 1), the novel Of Men and Monsters, the essay The Fiction in Science Fiction, and several other long pieces. Introduction by Robert Silverberg. Afterword by George Zebrowski. Dustjacket art by Rolf Mohr.
author: William Tenn
